library(pacman)

# load data
```{r}
s1 <- readRDS("rt2.Rda")
s2 <- readRDS("190226_nodeal.Rda")
s3 <- readRDS("190226_nodeal_lwr.Rda")
s4 <- readRDS("190227_ND.Rda")
s5 <- readRDS("190227_ND2.Rda")
s6 <- readRDS("190227_NDbog.Rda")
```

## making all list variables characters
```{r}
s1.1 <- s1 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

s2.1 <- s2 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

s3.1 <- s3 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

s4.1 <- s4 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

s5.1 <- s5 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

s6.1 <- s6 %>%
  mutate_if(is.list, as.character)

tw_raw <- s1.1 %>%
  full_join(s2.1) %>%
  full_join(s3.1) %>%
  full_join(s4.1) %>%
  full_join(s5.1) %>%
  full_join(s6.1)

rm(list=ls(pattern="s[1-9]"))
```


# some metrics
## nchar


# hashtags
## #leavemeansleave and #brexitbetreyal
```{r}
h_lml <- tw_raw %>%
  mutate(hashtags = str_to_lower(hashtags),
         leavemeansleave = str_detect(hashtags, "leavemeansleave"),
         brexitbetrayal = str_detect(hashtags, "brexitbetrayal"))
```


## most used hashtags
```{r}
most_used <- tw_raw %>%
  select(hashtags) %>%
  mutate(hashtags = str_remove_all(hashtags, ',|c\\(|\\)|\\"')) %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, hashtags, token = "words") %>%
  count(word, sort = T)

```
